# magora

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of magora is to allow the exploration of Mouse-Agora data (gene expressions and Alzheimer's pathology) in  Shiny app.

## Installation

You can install the development version of magora from GitHub with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("Sage-Bionetworks/magora", ref = "main")
```

And run the app via:

``` r
magora::run_app()
```
